headline: JB Hunt Transportation Services (JBHT) Had a Challenging Quarter. Here’s Why
summary: Heartland Advisors, an investment management company, released its “Heartland Opportunistic Value Equity Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The strategy returned 0.90% (net of bundled fees) in the quarter, compared to a 1.64% return for the Russell 3000® Value Index. Stock selection varied during the quarter, […]
